text: wqal 'iibrahim lqwmh: ya qawm 'iinama eabadtum min dun allah alihatan batlt, atkhdhtmwha mawadat baynikum fi alhayat aldnya, tthabwn ealaa ebadtha, wttwadwn ealaa khdmtha, thuma yawm alqyamt, ytbra baedukum min bed, wayalean baedukum bedana, wmsyrkm jmyeana alnar, walays lakum nasir yamnaekum min dkhwlha
